about_the_game:
※ In the demo version of SAVE, players can experience the first ship search mission out of the three operations that will be included in the Early Access version. Team up with up to four players in co-op mode and explore the SENARA, a meticulously recreated vessel, to immerse yourself in an intense and terrifying horror experience.

About SAVE

You are a former special forces operative, and a member of USTC (UDT/SEAL Tactical Consulting), a Korean private military company specializing in security services. One day, a professor from Miskatonic University offers you an irresistible sum in exchange for a suspicious assignment—tracking the voyage of the 6,000-ton passenger ship “SENARA”, owned by a religious group called the SENARA Gospel Mission, and monitoring any signs of ritual activity on board.

To complete this contract, you and your team must infiltrate “SENARA”, investigate, and gather the suspicious evidence requested by your client—however, the ship harbors unexpected supernatural occurrences and hidden dangers that lurk in the shadows.

Experience realistic horror in a meticulously recreated environment based on an actual 6,000-ton vessel. Face unknown threats, fight for survival, and put your courage and wit to the ultimate test.

Operation Plan

The 6,000-ton vessel " “SENARA” is located in international waters. Team up to four agents to infiltrate the ship and strategically manage any potential threats encountered on board. After collecting the target items, use the lifeboat on the ship to escape.

Phase 1: Preparation

Prepare for the mission using funds provided at the base camp. Assign individual roles and gather the necessary equipment to prepare for the search mission.

Phase 2: Search

 Each agent participating in the mission infiltrates different locations silently to avoid interference from internal resistance forces. After infiltrating the SENARA, swiftly investigate the ship and use communication gear to communicate closely and strategically search as many areas as possible

Phase 3: Threat Response

During the search mission, agents must quickly identify and share the identified threats with their fellow agents to strategically respond to threats. If compromised, agents risk being pursued, which could disrupt the mission.

Phase 4: Collect

The main objective is to thoroughly search the ‘SENARA,’ identify and collect the target items, and gather valuables found on the ship. Also, collect essential survival items to aid your search mission.

Phase 5: Extraction

Once the target items are secured, safely leave the SENARA using the planned evacuation method according to the operation plan to successfully complete the mission.

short_description: SAVE is a coop survival horror game. The player plays as a PMC operative contracted by Miskatonic University, and embarks on a nightmarish mission to uncover the hidden secrets of the 6,000-ton vessel, “SENARA”

*languages with full audio support
